pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 20$(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Villages, Igloo    $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() 3 Bread or 12 Carrots or 12 Potatoes or 12 Beetroots in her inventory + a free Bed $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Inhabit $(thing)Villages$(), work at their professions, breed, and interact with each other. Their outfit varies according to their occupation and biome. A $(thing)Player$() can trade with $(thing)Villagers$() using $(item)Emeralds$() as currency.
